department.ch: 法律與政府研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 智慧財產權的發展與科技社會的進步有關，而智慧權法被視為是知識經濟時代的基礎法律，包括著作權法、營業祕密法、專利法、商標法及相關法律。本專題課程從社會生活與法律實務探討智慧財產權與社會發展關係，對有心學習科技法律與投入科技、文化產業、商場競爭的同學，將能建立知識與研究的基礎。
goal.en: "First, the teaching objectives:Intellectual property development and progress of science and technology community, whereas the Intellectual property law is regarded as the legal basis for the knowledge economy era, including copyright law, trade secret law, patent law, trademark law and related laws. This course examines the relationship between intellectual property rights and social development, social life and legal practice, determined to study science and technology to legal and investment in technological, culture Industry, business competition. For students who are interested in study and will be able to build a foundation of knowledge and research.

outline.ch: 1.課程介紹2.智慧財產權、知識經濟與社會變遷3.著作人格權與著作財產權4.著作權的合理使用、侵權與救濟5.著作授權、創用CC與學術倫理6.文化創意產業與著作權7.商標法主要規範、品牌與行銷8.商標仿冒侵權與救濟9.商標與網域名稱的衝突與爭議處理機制10營業秘密法規範與經濟間諜11.侵害營業秘密案例探討12.專利法規範與人工智慧議題
outline.en: 1. Course introduction2. Intellectual property rights structure and modern social changes3. Intellectual property rights and basic legal concepts4. Copyright: Personality and Property Rights5. Copyright: Author, Assignment and Authorization6. Restrictions on Copyright / Fair Use, Infringement and Relief7. Trademarks, branding and marketing8. Major Trademark Law, Infringement and Relief9. Conflicts and disputes between trademarks and domain names10. Trade secret law and economic espionage11. Case Study on Infringement of Trade Secrets12. Patent Law and AI

textbook.ch: 1.徐振雄，智慧財產權概論，台北：新文京，2022年。2.章忠信，《著作權法逐條釋義》。3 林洲富，《商標法：案例式》，台北：五南。4.馮震宇，《了解營業秘密法：營業秘密法的理論與實務》，台北：永然。其他參考資料於課堂說明
textbook.en: 1. Xu Zhenxiong, intellectual property rights introduction, Taipei: New Bunkyo, 2022.

gradMethod.ch: 出缺席、提問及討論情況30％、期中報告30％、期末報告40％
gradMethod.en: "The absence of questions and discussion 20%, learning portfolio by 10%, 30% interim report, final report 40%"

officeHour.ch: 課後 與教師另行預約
